EmailTemplate.name: WBN-202209-HHS-HAC-HWBR-Virtual-Nursing-Webinar.invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Virtual nursing webinar: How to address staffing challenges with a virtual care solution
EmailTemplate.textOnly: WEBINAR Virtual nursing: How to address staffing challenges with a virtual care solution September 29 | 1 p.m. Eastern In this webinar, you’ll learn how virtual nursing offers new strategies to address staffing shortages while supporting care team collaboration and increasing workflow efficiencies. Webinar attendees will: - Understand the trends of how hospitals and health systems are addressing nurse staffing challenges with virtual care - Learn the value of integrating an in-person and virtual care hybrid model with inpatient care delivery - Hear how leading health systems are implementing virtual nursing and the positive impact they’re seeing About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
